title: Australian diary. No. 088
creator_credit: Australian National Film Board and Jack S. Allan
brief_description: A team of women golfers from Britain show their skill on Sydney’s Kensington Links; Trade Unions celebrate the centenary of the movement for shorter working hours - 8 hours work, 8 hours recreation, 8 hours rest; the Valley of Burragorang is deemed to die in the interests of progress - a vast inland sea providing water for Sydney will take possession of the land.
